title: Does anyone know what type face Snellen Charts are. (eye exam chart)
content:
I think its Rockwell but I could be mistaken.

Thank You

m

 [‹ ULVAC - Japanese brand ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012070247/http:/typophile.com/node/38796 "Go to previous forum topic") [Identifying two simple serif designs... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012070247/http:/typophile.com/node/38822 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mashtea

comments.content: Snellen chart that I have seen uses Courier. Maybe there are more types, using other fonts.
Snellen chart that I have seen uses Courier Bold. Maybe there are more types, using other fonts.

AFAIK, there is no standard typeface for these charts, and many use custom designed letters. However, Rockwell would be a good choice to emulate the typical slab-serif that appears on them.

- Lex
